item.description:
April's brunch will be on the waterfront...

The Boat House Restaurant in Tiverton

Here's their brunch menu:

Special Omelet of the Day

Eggs Benedict - 2 poached eggs, applewood smoked bacon, english mufffins and hollandaise

Seafood Benedict - 2 poached eggs, crab cakes, applewood smoked bacon, english muffins and hollandaise

Sakonnet Sunrise - 2 eggs any style, french toast, applewood smoked bacon

Cheese Omelet - 3 egg omelet with your choice of cheese

Amaretto & Peach French Toast - sweet bread, egg batter, peaches with simple syrup

Brunch sandwich of the day

Check them out at http://www.boathouset...

Hope you can make it !!!
item.name: April Brunch - Boat House Restaurant
